span_48: John H. Stroger, Jr. Hospital of Cook County
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Our program has a dynamic fellowship-trained supportive faculty dedicated to education and research. This is a large urban safety net hospital that provides extensive experience in a world renowned Level 1 trauma center. Fourth year electives allow flexibility within the curriculum. Visit our website for more information. https://www.radiologycookcounty.com/
